title: Greece's Varoufakis forms new party to tackle debt
text:
Greece's Varoufakis forms new party to tackle debt   01:42 
Yanis Varoufakis, Greece's former finance minister who transfixed Europe with his unconventional style at the climax of the debt crisis, has launched a new party promising to free his country from debt bondage. As Sonia Legg reports, the firebrand academic economist - who once described the austerity imposed by Greece's creditors as ''fiscal waterboarding'' - said his new MeRA25 party would revive the economy. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
